price: 12.Tohuk lakat woo xiinik ken ugusneh namma buttak A-furrayna gablal waktik sugteh gideh ixxigat keenik yayse mara naaxaguh.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰهُمۡ لِنَعۡلَمَ أَيُّ ٱلۡحِزۡبَيۡنِ أَحۡصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوٓاْ أَمَدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnāhum linaʿlama ayyu al-ḥiz'bayni aḥṣā limā labithū amadan
